name: Space Wolves From Outer Space
description:
Werewolves have always protected the universe from supernatural evil…

Space Wolves From Outer Space is a turn-based strategy game about territorial control and managing a city's defenses.

Three factions vie for criminal superiority: The Cyber-Minotaurs, The Mages of the Technocracy, and the Bio-Demon Union. You control a pack of werewolves to keep the conflict from escalating, but a larger threat is on the horizon.

Use pack tactics to drive three different gangs into conflict with one another. Your subtle influence will determine the fate of your city!
